title: Cant see my ticket
body:
Hello my account got hacked and I submitted a ticket but all is showing when I try to view my ticket is OOPS
The page you were looking for doesn't exist

You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved

Take me back to the home page

Please help me!

replies.body:
That's strange, are you logged into the ticketing center?  What's the ticket number?  I'd be happy to check on it for you!  

If on the off change it was for an account recover, then you'll want to do an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) instead, which doesn't require logging in.  Let me know!
